question: Which of the following details is/are correct regarding the Size India’ project, recently seen in news? 1.In this project the Clothing Manufacturers Association of India (CMAI) will work with the Union Ministry of Textiles. 2.The aim is to arrive at standard Indian sizes for apparels. 3.Anthropometric data will be collected from 25,000 sample population in age group 15 to 65 years across six major cities. Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: CMAI will conduct a study across India to arrive at standard sizes. The ‘Size India’ project will help create a India-specific size chart for the textiles and garment industry. The project will reduce overall prices and the consumers will stand to benefit from it.
